subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees made good on their insistence that they would keep Brett Gardner — even after signing Jacoby Ellsbury in December — with a new deal that starts in 2015 and is worth $52 million.
snippet: The Yankees made good on their insistence that they would keep Brett Gardner — even after signing Jacoby Ellsbury in December — with a new deal that starts in 2015 and is worth $52 million.
